about_the_game:
Unleash the chaos in ChatBattlers, the must-play, interactive Twitch experience! Transform your slime into a battle-hardened champion with endless customization options—think rare skins, epic weapons, and exclusive collectibles. Engage in fast-paced, real-time action where every move counts as you compete in dynamic, streamer-driven events. Dominate your friends, foes, and even the streamer for ultimate bragging rights. Are you ready to rise to the top in this viewer-powered showdown?

  • Customize your Slime's Costume, Skin, Color, Eyes, Weapon & Accessories

  • Compete in Battle Arenas, Races, GoSplat our version of Slimey Gooey Goopey, very moist Ice Breaker

  • Full Transparency support for Streamers to integrate with your content

  • DMCA-Free Music to play on your stream, fully licensed by our Studio to enjoy.

  • Fully automatic & idle modes so you can sleep on stream. Yea, you, we see you.

  • Monthly Seasons with Content releases & Leaderboards

  • Control over who & what spawns.

  • Tons and tons more customizations for you, your stream, and your viewers.

name: ChatBattlers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 Ti (or equivalent with DirectX 11 support)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 (or equivalent with DirectX 11 support)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: ChatBattlers is the ultimate Twitch-integrated brawl where slimes can be cute... or downright fierce! Customize your slime with outrageous skins & rare collectibles. Jump into chaotic, action-packed battles against everyone in chat, and flex your style. Will your slime be the last one standing?
